item.title: A Little Reflection. A Little Photo Sharing. Part 2 of 3: 7/17/15
item.description:
A Little Reflection. A Little Photo Sharing. Part 2 of 3: 7/17/15

So, I have to give a shout out to my dear friend,@thecuriousrose, for being a badass and holding me accountable—she also gave me an incredible shout out, today, for her #TGIFW, which is utterly appreciated.

item.title: A Little Reflection. A Little Photo Sharing. Part 1 of 3: 7/16/15
item.description:
A Little Reflection. A Little Photo Sharing. Part 1 of 3: 7/16/15

There are few things in this world more enjoyable than what you see above—bread, cheese, wine, olives, cured meats. (I would also add endless pints of cider and Guinness, among other things.) I live for these moments. A perfect amount of delectability, topped off with a hot, fried slab of what-have-you.

item.title: Retracing My Steps
item.description:
Retracing My Steps

In Mutable Scenes

Unless you've been hiding under a rock, then you probably already know that today has been a pretty kick-ass day. We just struck a deal with Iran(historic). It's 14th July, which means that it's Bastille Day (click that link and enjoy yourself some required reading from the Paris Review).(Historic(al)). And, last but certainly not least, we just did a flyby, taking a look at Pluto as we've never done before

item.title: The Desert of Intention
item.description:
The Desert of Intention

Fever Dream

"You came to the desert intending to starve      so starve"—Kazim Ali, "Gallery," from The Far Mosque, 2005.

item.title: Preface: To begin. As if to say, I'm here. Or, I heard a voice.
item.description:
Preface: To begin. As if to say, I'm here. Or, I heard a voice.

Here it goes:

So, I’m making this a commitment.
